description: From a bio-mechanically designed outsole to full foot protection, the Oboz Katabatic hiking shoe is an on-trail performer first and foremost. Adding our lightest midsole and a highly abrasion-resistant lining, the Katabatic Mid will help get you to your destination before the light fades day after day.
name: Oboz Katabatic Mid - Mens

specs.value: Oboz’s most-tested rubber compound boasting superior slip-resistance, enhanced durability, and improved elongation and tensile strength
